549170.name: Army Men II
549170.description:
Army Men II, the sequel to the best-selling title Army Men, takes plastic toy soldier warfare into the kitchen, bedroom, front yard, and garage. Once again Sarge will lead his heroic Green forces into head-melting, plastic-body-part-exploding, combat mayhem; only this time the battle is for control of the kitchen sink!
  • Crazy weapons: magnifying glasses and spray cans complement your traditional arsenal.
  • Plastic warfare's finest hour: nothing's as fun as melting Tan troops into puddles of plastic!
  • The kitchen campaigns: toy soldier warfare moves to the kitchen, bedroom, front yard, and garage!
549170.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
